news.title: Punjab Haryana HC Addresses Farmer Rights and Agricultural Reforms
news.content: The Punjab and Haryana High Court has issued crucial directives on farmer rights, addressing issues of crop insurance, minimum support prices, and agricultural reform implementation to protect farming communities.

news.title: Water Sharing Agreement Implementation
news.content: The Punjab and Haryana High Court continues to monitor the implementation of water sharing agreements between the two states, ensuring equitable distribution and sustainable water management practices.

news.title: Industrial Air Quality Monitoring Mandated
news.content: The Punjab and Haryana High Court has mandated comprehensive air quality monitoring in industrial zones, with particular focus on reducing pollution levels and ensuring compliance with environmental standards.
